publisher: Rui Fontes <rui.fontes@tiflotecnia.com>, Ângelo Abrantes <ampa4374@gmail.com>, Zougane, Remy and Abdel
description: This add-on provides a quick way to access documentation for the add-ons you have installed, creating, in the NVDA Help menu, two  sub-menus. One, called "Running add-ons documentation", grouping the documentation and a list of commands for running add-ons, and another sub-menu called "Disabled add-ons documentation",  listing the disabled add-ons documentation.
